title: PPPP invite applications from party candidates for by-polls
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 09 (APP):Pakistan Peoples Party Parliamentarians (PPPP) has invited applications from party candidates for the upcoming by-elections in NA-1 Chitral and NA-18 Haripur constituencies.
According press release issued here on Thursday, the interested candidates have been asked to submit their applications by October 15 to Syed Nayyar Hussain Bukhari,Â  PPPP Secretary General.
The applicants are required to attach a bank draft of Rs. 50,000 along with their applications and send them to the following address: House No. 8, Street No. 19, F-8/2, Zardari House, Islamabad.
